problem.markdown:
>>Inflammation of the kidneys is called<< ( ) otitis ( ) hepatitis ( ) rephritis ( ) toxemia
>>Most blood pumps use the principle of<< ( ) peristaltic compression ( ) centrifuge ( ) compression ( ) normal acceleration
>>To reduce hemolysis, the blood pump design should provide a flow that minimises<< ( ) oxygen tension ( ) turbulence ( ) body temperature ( ) continuous flow
>>In dialysis the waste products are transferred to the dialysate by<< ( ) surface tension ( ) centrifuge ( ) diffusion ( ) viscosity variation
>>In hemodialysis, the temperature system consists of heater element and switch, seals, housing temperature gauge and Control. Usual temperature range is<< ( ) 33 ~ 36º C ( ) 36 ~ 39º C ( ) 38 ~ 42º C ( ) 33 ~ 42º C
